DataElement.preferredName: Protocol National Institutes of Health Grants and Contracts Identifier Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the unique numeric identifier of a National Institutes of Health protocol grant.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Protocol National Institutes of Health Grants and Contracts Identifier
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the the unique identifier assigned to a protocol or clinical research grant or contract by the National Institutes of Health.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action plan for a clinical trial.  The plan states what the study will do, how, and why.  It explains how many people will be in it, who is eligible to participate, what study agents or other interventions they will be given, what tests they will receive and how often, and what information will be gathered.:Monetary awards made by NIH for research and support services.

Concepts.definition: A formal document that describes a complete plan of research activity in the framework of a clinical study; specifically, the study objective(s), design, methodology, eligibility requests for prospective subjects and controls; intervention regimen(s), proposed methods of analysis of data; statistical considerations, and organization of the study. The protocol usually also provides the background and rationale for the study, but these could be represented in other protocol referenced documents.
Monetary awards made by NIH for research and support services.

Property.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredName: National Institutes of Health Grant Number
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the numeral or string of numerals used for identification of National Institutes of Health grant or contract .

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
